articles.title: Japan Warned of Rapidly Veering to Ultra-right: News Analyst
articles.content:
Japan Warned of Rapidly Veering to Ultra-right: News Analyst
						
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The Abe government is leading the Japanese society to veer to the ultra-right, reminiscent of a war state more than 70 years back.
					 It is regarding it as its basic strategy for winning the July Diet election to rally conservative forces through the society's lurch to the ultra-right.
					
					 The prime minister openly chanted the slogan "Long live the emperor", stirring up an atmosphere of militarism in the "era of empire". Visits of ministers and lawmakers from the ruling and opposition parties to Yasukuni Shrine have become more frequent.
					
					The so-called "ceremony for restoring sovereignty" has been held in Japan as a non-governmental event of right-wing organizations for 17 years. But it was held at a governmental level for the first time this year. The Abe cabinet has become more undisguised in its attempt to revise the Constitution.
					
					 Before and after taking office as prime minister, Abe said "he would begin his work by revising Article 96 of the Constitution". At a press conference held on April 19 he expressed again his will to revise the article aimed to ease the necessary requirements for proposing the revision of the Constitution. Abe's intention to rewrite the relevant article defining the norms for the constitutional revision is aimed to revise Article 9, the core article of the Constitution by lowering the threshold of the revision. Article 9 bans Japan from possessing combat forces and exercising the right to participate in a war and that to collective self-defense. Its revision would make it possible for Japan to have a war constitution and help provide a legal and institutional mechanism for turning Japan into a military giant and launching overseas aggression. Then, Japan will be able to send its aggression forces to any region of the world for military operations, unhindered by its domestic l
					
					 aw.
					
					 It is the scenario of the present Japanese ruling forces to liquidate the "Pacifist Constitution" by rewriting Article 96 and totally revising Article 9. Now no one would question in which direction Japan is going.
					
					 What matters is that the ultra-right conservative forces are exercising ever-increasing influence on the process of veering to the Right and that of turning itself into a military giant.
					
					 The ultra-right forces of Japan are desperately pushing forward the process to consolidate the power and fascistize the society, going beyond the phase of exercising influence on the authorities' policy making. A war constitution may appear in Japan any time. 
					
					 Japan's rapid lurch to the ultra-right means, in essence, the conversion into a war state.
					
					 The militarist ambition of the Japanese rightist reactionaries is expanding worldwide, going beyond East Asia.
					
					 The danger of war is increasing day by day due to these rightist reactionaries who openly call for reviving the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere." This is posing a great threat to global peace and security.
					
					 Revived Japanese militarism is bound to bring a horrible war disaster again not only to Asia but to the rest of the world.
					
					 The despicable behavior of the Abe government pushing Japan's society to the ultra-right is arousing serious caution and concern among the people of countries and regions in East Asia and the rest of the world.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Force Can Not Be Bargaining Chip: Newspaper
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Force Can Not Be Bargaining Chip: Newspaper 
						
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's nuclear force guarantees the nation's dignity and sovereignty. It is the treasure of reunified Korea and a powerful means for ensuring peace. Therefore, this can not be a bargaining chip, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 For nearly seven decades after the first manufacture of nuclear weapons in the world, there have been many wars, big or small, in different regions of the world. It was only nuclear weapons states that evaded military aggression.
					
					 No aggressor will dare make an attack on a country that is equipped with nuclear weapons of precision strike capabilities no matter wherever their bases might be on earth. The stronger nuclear strike abilities will present greater strength for deterring aggression.
					
					  Peace and prosperity as well as the happy life of the Koreans are guaranteed by the powerful nuclear force.
					
					 Peace has been preserved on the Korean Peninsula, the most unstable hotspot in the world. It is thanks to the efforts of the DPRK which has bolstered up the deterrent for self-defense in the face of the evermore undisguised war moves for aggression on the part of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 If the DPRK had not held up the banner of Songun and failed to build the powerful war deterrent, a nuclear war might have broken out on the peninsula long ago.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet regime, afraid of the DPRK's smaller, lighter and diversified nuclear deterrence, are making desperate efforts to remove it at any cost.
					
					 The situation goes to clearly prove that the DPRK's nuclear deterrence serves as the first and foremost means for defense to completely contain the U.S. imperialists and the puppet warmongers and ensure the peaceful circumstances and stable conditions for the development and prosperity of the country and the nation.

articles.title: It Is U.S. That Scrapped AA: Newspaper
articles.content:
It Is U.S. That Scrapped AA: Newspaper
						
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army in a statement issued by its spokesman voided the Korean Armistice Agreement (AA), which had existed for mere form's sake. No one is entitled to find fault with the DPRK over this action.
					 Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article says this on Saturday.
					
					 The article cites facts to disclose U.S. actions of making AA a dead document.
					
					 It says:
					
					 The U.S. made the pact a waste paper. It also abused it as a signboard for escalating the war moves of invading the DPRK.
					
					 Under such prevailing situation, it is clear that Pyongyang can no longer remain bound by the pact nor remain an onlooker to the daily escalated war moves.
					
					 Such a measure of the DPRK is a quite natural one as it is determined to go into military actions for self-defense against any targets any moment, not restrained by the pact which had already become a dead document in order to mercilessly punish the aggressors and win the historic wish of Koreans for national reunification.
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it judges it can bring the DPRK into submission as it did in other parts of the world, regarding the threat, blackmail, high-handedness and pressure as a panacea for ruling the world.
					
					 In case the situation on the Korean Peninsula develops in a catastrophic way, the U.S. will be wholly to blame as it persistently moved to scrap the pact.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Evading Responsibility for KIZ Crisis
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Evading Responsibility for KIZ Crisis 
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the south Korean puppet Ministry of Unification on May 1 let loose a spate of sophism that the crisis of the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) was caused by the "north's unjust measure", crying out for "right option for normalization". 
					 The minister of Unification said that south Korea demanded the north withdraw its measure because "it was unjust" and as the north did not accept the demand, south Korea decided the withdrawal of its personnel from the KIZ.
					
					 Even the chief of Chongwadae rattled the nerve of the north, saying that "now the agreement has ended in smoke overnight".
					
					 These are irrational insistences changing the cause and effect, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in a bylined commentary. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The main cause of the extreme crisis of KIZ is the vicious anti-DPRK confrontation moves of the south Korean authorities. 
					
					 They slandered to an uncontrollable extent the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, partner of cooperation in KIZ and gravely threatened it with provocations for a nuclear war. 
					
					 It was the just step of the DPRK that it withdrew its personnel from KIZ and temporarily closed it to cope with the vicious confrontation and war moves of south Korea. 
					
					 Pyongyang made every effort for the stable development of KIZ even at a time when the north-south relations were in wartime situation, but the south Korean authorities ran amuck to do away with KIZ, a product of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					
					 The work in the zone has faced a tragic end after its nearly 10-year operation amid turns and twists. The south Korean authorities are responsible for this. 
					
					 The south Korean ruling quarters can never cover the crimes against reunification by which they drove KIZ into the state of misfortune as now. -0-

articles.title: Japan's Intention for Overseas Aggression under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Intention for Overseas Aggression under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The draft amendment to the constitution worked out by the Japan Liberal Democratic Party specifies Japan's access to the defense force according to the revised content of its Article 9. Japanese Prime Minister Abe blared that "it was set to make sure that the defense force would carry out its responsibility from the standpoint of ensuring collective security for peace and stability of the international community" and that Japan's access to the defense force "will make it possible for the defense force to get involved in the UN forces."
					 Minju Joson Saturday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This proves that the Japanese reactionaries are working hard to remove the institutional mechanism which bans Japan from participating in war and openly take the path for militarist overseas aggression.
					
					 If Japan truly wants global peace, there is no need to revise the present constitution which reflects the will of the international community and the mindset of the Asian people.
					
					 What the Japanese reactionaries seek is to build war force as it did before World War II and opt for a war for militarist overseas aggression.
					
					 The Japan "Self-Defence Forces" have changed into world-class forces with modern arms and equipment and the scope of their operations now covers broad areas of the Indian Ocean and the Pacific, going beyond areas for self-defense.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are now trumpeting about the immediate revision of the present constitution, while crying out for "threat" from a certain country. This is a dangerous ploy to bring earlier the day when their ambition for overseas aggression is attained.
					
					 The clouds of disaster brought by the island country Japan have already been formed, and it is the matter of time when it will be inflicted upon mankind.

articles.title: Acquittal of Those Related to Minjok Ilbo Case Admitted in S. Korea
articles.content:
Acquittal of Those Related to Minjok Ilbo Case Admitted in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- An acquittal of those related to the case of Minjok Ilbo was admitted in south Korea on April 29 in the wake of the continued discovery of the truth about the false cases cooked up by the "yusin" fascist dictatorial regime.
					 That day the puppet Seoul Central District Court admitted the acquittal of Song Ji Yong who was suppressed by the Park Chung-Hee military fascist junta on charges of involvement in the Minjok Ilbo case.
					
					 As already known, the fascist junta closed the newspaper Minjok Ilbo on the suspicion of "founding Minjok Ilbo and sympathizing with the north's activities after receiving funds for operations from a suspected spy" in 1961. It arrested its manager Jo Yong Su, Song Ji Yong and other innocent persons over the case and sentenced them to death and life imprisonment on charges of violation of the "special law on punishing special criminals".
					
					 In 2006 the south Korean Committee for Settling the Past History for Truth and Reconciliation made a decision to probe the truth after defining the Minjok Ilbo case as suppression of a typical paper representing the call of the reformist circle in those days.
					
					 After the disclosure of the truth about the case in January 2008, the acquittal of Jo Yong Su who had been executed on a false charge was confirmed. In 2010 Yang Su Jong who was director of the editorial board was also declared not guilty.
					
					 The court admitted the acquittal of Song Ji Yong at a retrial. It held that the "special law on punishing special criminals" which the military forces invoked for punishment in those days had unconstitutional elements.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Illegal Action Condemned
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Illegal Action Condemned
						
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The website editorial board of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. released a statement on April 26 to denounce the south Korean puppet group for letting an international hacking group disturb the legal internet activities of the organization.
					 The statement recalled that the international hacking group on April 18 attacked the website of the federation and opened to public the list of subscribers, adding this is obviously a criminal act.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the recent hacking was committed at the instigation of the south Korean puppet government, it noted.
					
					 No sooner had the list of subscribers been opened to public than the puppet intelligence organ kicked up a racket to crack down on "forces following the north", the one for suppressing pro-reunification patriots of south Korea, and slandering the federation, it said.
					
					 We cannot pardon the south Korean conservative forces' shameless use of the legitimate and official internet activities for the racket to suppress "forces following the north", it warned.
					
					 It urged the south Korean authorities to make an apology and reparation for their illegal crime.
					
					 It stressed that the federation will force the south Korean "government" to pay due price for its crime.

articles.title: Heir Apparent of Qatar on Boosting Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Heir Apparent of Qatar on Boosting Relations with DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- I wish HE Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, good health and big success in his work.
					 Tamim bin Hamad al-Thani, heir apparent of Qatar, said this on April 22 when receiving credentials from DPRK Ambassador to his country So Chang Sik.
					
					 I am very pleased to see the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries developing on good terms, the heir apparent said, hoping that the relations would grow stronger in the future.
					
					 He expressed belief that the DPRK would demonstrate its might as a stronger country, beating back all challenges against it despite the extremely acute situation on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: KPA Anniversary Observed Abroad
articles.content:
KPA Anniversary Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Events took place abroad in the period between April 23 and 25 to mark the 81st anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 They included opening ceremonies of Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions in Russia and Peru and a lecture in Guinea.
					
					 Displayed in the venues of the exhibitions were photos dealing with immortal exploits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display also were works of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 A vice mayor of a Russian city said in his speech at an opening ceremony of the exhibition that the KPA has grown up to be matchless army under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He continued:
					
					 We hear with great interest the news of the revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un successfully carrying out the behests of the preceding leaders.
					
					 The DPRK has emerged victorious in the DPRK-U.S. confrontation.
					
					 No one in the world can match the DPRK in which the leader, the party, army and the people are single-mindedly united.
					
					 At the end of an opening ceremony, the governor of San Isidro District, Lima City, Peru, going round the venue of the exhibition, said he was greatly excited to see the developed culture of the DPRK and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 A vice director of a Guinean company in the lecture noted that the invincible might of the KPA draws the attention of the international community.

articles.title: Statement of DPRK FM Spokesman Supported by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Statement of DPRK FM Spokesman Supported by Swiss Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on April 27 in support of the statement released by a spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK denouncing the U.S. "human rights" ballad.
					 The U.S. again viciously defamed the DPRK in its "2012 report on human rights", the statement said, adding:
					
					 It is a well known fact that the U.S. is slandering the independent countries through its "report on human rights".
					
					 However, such a report can not work on the DPRK.
					
					 Socialist Korea is a country in which all the service personnel and people are single-mindedly united around the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Human rights are fully guaranteed in the DPRK and there does not exist anything like "human rights issue".
					
					 The U.S. styling itself the human rights judge is, indeed, the worst human rights abuser and the chief culprit inflicting all sorts of misfortune and disaster upon the Korean people.
					
					 The DPRK, which had access to strong nuclear deterrent to cope with the U.S. hostile policy, will further bolster it up.
					
					 The U.S. should understand that it can never bring down the socialist system, an option of the Korean people.

articles.title: Events in Romania, Pakistan Support Korean People's Just Cause
articles.content:
Events in Romania, Pakistan Support Korean People's Just Cause
						
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- A meeting and a demonstration took place respectively in Romania and Pakistan on April 18 and 24. Participants in the events supported the just cause of the Korean people.
					 They included personages of political parties and organizations including the Socialist Party of Romania, Romanian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, Trade Union Federation, Railway Trade Union Federation and the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Pakistan and the Sind Provincial Committee of the Labor Party of Pakistan and masses.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania said the U.S. and the south Korean regime are making desperate efforts to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The U.S. is a harasser of peace and security on the peninsula.
					
					 It is talking about "dialogue" but it is nothing but sophism to mislead the world public opinion and conceal its true colors as aggressors.
					
					 It should stop all its war maneuvers against the DPRK and retract the sanctions against it. That is the only way for peace on the peninsula.
					
					 The chairman of the Pakistan Trade Union Federation and other personages referred to the touch-and-go situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the war moves of U.S. imperialism.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK are firmly defending their socialist country, foiling the U.S. moves of aggression, united close around the Workers' Party of Korea, they added.

articles.title: KPA Anniversary Observed by Russian Papers
articles.content:
KPA Anniversary Observed by Russian Papers
						
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Russian papers carried special write-ups illustrated with photos of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu conducting revolutionary activities to mark the 81st anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The Russian paper Patriot No. 15 referred to the validity of the new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and buildup of nuclear force set forth by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It carried an article calling on progressive humanity to extend support to the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					 Veteran No. 16 introduced in detail that the Korean revolutionary armed forces created the history of winning victory after victory in the showdown with the imperialists thanks to the great brilliant Songun commanders.
					
					 Another paper on April 17 in an article titled "The rumbling thunder in the East" underlined the validity of the third underground nuclear test conducted by the DPRK to cope with the accusation of the U.S. and its allies over the satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that the world community called the nuclear test a thunder-like measure of justice to punish injustice, the article said, adding the DPRK's thunder will continue rolling in the future, too.
					
					 Noting that the U.S. suffered a miserable defeat in the past Korean war, it warned that the U.S. should never forget it but be aware that the DPRK is no longer a young country as in the 1950s.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia concierto de Orquesta Unhasu dedicado al Primero de Mayo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia concierto de Orquesta Unhasu dedicado al Primero de Mayo
						
Pyongyang, 4 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio el concierto de la Orquesta Unhasu que se ofrece en estos dias en el capitalino Teatro del Pueblo con motivo del Primero de Mayo, Dia Internacional de los Trabajadores.
					Cuando el Mariscal salio al palco, los espectadores, que esperaban el inicio del concierto, le recibieron con estruendosas "Vivas" mostrandose muy emocionados por tenerlo inesperadamente.
					
					El espectaculo, iniciado con el Himno Nacional, tuvo en su repertorio las piezas de diferentes generos, incluyendo el coro mixto "Mayo de triunfo", el solo masculino "Galopa el caballo Chollima" y la musica orquestal "Jamas olvidaremos".
					
					Los deportistas heroes quienes se coronaron campeones en los 30o Juegos Olimpicos y los obreros de la Fabrica de Alimentos para Ninos de Pyongyang subieron a la escena y entonaron con fervor las canciones "Que es lo que hemos grabado en nuestros corazones" y "No tiene fin la anoranza".
					
					Los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico la historia de lucha en que bajo la sabia guia de los grandes hombres sin iguales, se crearon milagros sorprendentes al mundo en el periodo posbelico y se abrio la senda de prosperidad superando las pruebas y dificultades, y describieron el futuro maravilloso de la potencia del monte Paektu que presento la linea de impulso paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					En particular, la musica orquestal y el coro mixto "La querida casa en mi tierra natal" y el solo femenino y coro mixto "Nuestra bayoneta garantiza la paz" dejaron profundamente impresionados a los espectadores.
					
					Esas canciones fueron repetidas en la escena por la solicitud encarecida del publico.
					
					El concierto termino con el coro mixto "El Presidente y el Dirigente se encuentran juntos".
					
					En representacion del publico, el Mariscal solicito la repeticion de "La querida casa en mi tierra natal" y "Nuestra bayoneta garantiza la paz".
					
					Expuso su gran satisfaccion de que los ejecutantes hayan ofrecido otra funcion excelente con claro tema ideologico en el contenido y la forma que ha reflejado la aspiracion, deseo, decision y voluntad de nuestro pueblo, y evaluo altamente los exitos de la funcion.
					
					Expreso agradecimiento a la orquesta a nombre del Primer Secretario del PTC senalando que ella es vanguardia del frente ideologico y propagandista confiable del PTC.
					
					Este buen concierto infunde, con sus musicas tan poderosas como bombas atomicas, en todo el ejercito y pueblo el espiritu de defensa de la patria socialista, la voluntad de exterminar a los enemigos, la conviccion y optimismo de la victoria y refleja integramente nuestra posicion y principios revolucionarios, subrayo.
					
					"La querida casa en mi tierra natal", cancion creada durante la pasada guerra coreana y caracterizada por profundo sentido filosofico y patriotismo, ha sido redescrita bien esta vez conforme al espiritu de la epoca, dijo y prosiguio que nuestros uniformados y civiles emprenderan la batalla decisiva cantando las canciones del tiempo de guerra como esa si se desata en este territorio la segunda guerra coreana.
					
					"Nuestra bayoneta garantiza la paz" es la cancion muy buena que refleja nuestra posicion de principios que no se afloja nunca ante los enemigos deseosos de atropellar nuestra patria socialista, acoto.
					
					Gracias a las canciones revolucionarias y combativas como "La querida casa en mi tierra natal" y "Nuestra bayoneta garantiza la paz", el ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC saldran victoriosos en el enfrentamiento final con los enemigos, resalto.
					
					Manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que los creadores y artistas de Unhasu estimularan mucho a los uniformados y civiles dinamizando la creacion artistica y las actividades de funcion.
					
					Disfrutaron con el Mariscal el concierto Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Kyok Sik, Hwang Pyong So, Kang Phil Hun, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol, Pak Jong Chon, Jon Chang Bok, trabajadores capitalinos y otros de diferentes localidades que estan ahora de visita a la ciudad de Pyongyang.
